import React, { Component } from "react"; import "./style.css"; import SlideShow from "../SlideShow"; import * as mobileApi from "../apis/mobile"; import * as toast from "../../Common/helper/toastHelper"; export default class index extends Component { state = { product: {}, sohinhanh: 0 }; addToCart() { toast.toastSucces("Đã thêm 1 sản phẩm"); } componentDidMount() { var { loai } = this.props.match.params; var { hang } = this.props.match.params; var { dong } = this.props.match.params; var { sanpham } = this.props.match.params; var query = `/${loai}/${hang}/${dong}/${sanpham}`; mobileApi .mobileInfo(query) .then((success) => { //console.log("status"+JSON.stringify(success)); if (success.status == 200) {this.setState({ product: success.data.value[0], sohinhanh: success.data.serializerSettings.sohinhanh - 1, }); } }) .catch((error) => { console.log("error" + error); }); } render() { return (
